isOn = true; } public function deactivate() { $this->isOn = false; } public function isActive() { return $this->isOn; } } $machine = new Kettle(); $machine->activate(); if($machine->isActive()) { echo "The machine is on"; } else { echo "The machine is off"; } echo "

summary: This tutorial covers PHPinterfaceKeyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPinterfaceKeyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PHPinterfaceKeyword and how to apply it in your projects.
